Name: LoliTower
About the game: After the death battle with the Lord of Vampire, Winpton found that the Lord of Vampire is still alive. He is then resurrected by the Angel with additional five days to live and fight. In his last five days, He will fight with his genius disciple, Faith, and train her to become the most powerful Vampire Slayer ever.. This is a game of a dying who sacrifices himself to keep his inheritance and faith eternal Winpton Hunter Experience: Throughout his life, Mr. Hunter practices swordsmanship in order to slay the Lord of Vampire who lives at the top of the tower. By his abundant battle experience, he can completely ignore the enemy's defense. Although he is master of battling, he is actually not a good teacher. His early disciples were mostly dead or seriously injured. At the age of 28, he saved Faith and raised her to an adult. He was shocked by the unpredictable potential and the agile body skills of Faith. However, in order to keep her far from danger, Mr. Hunter did not let Faith to participate in actual combat. He lied that he gave Faith her name in the homophony of False. Age: 36 Personality: enthusiasm, cheerful, unrestrained, sympathetic, have his own simple but explicit sense of justice Relationship: Faith's adoptive father Faith Hunter Experience: Faith has been living with wolves as an orphan before she was 8 years old. One day she accidentally falling off the cliff and was serious injured. She was then rescued by Mr. Hunter, and was adopted and given the name of Faith. Although Mr.Hunter did not teach her swordsmanship, she created her skills with seven different types. Age: 16 Personality: calm, expressionless, has a cold appearance but warm heart Relationship: the adopted daughter of Winpton Hunter Lord of Vampire The Lord of Vampire has lived for more than 400 years. He is really powerful. While he cherishes the talented, he loves to persuade the powerful human beings to drink his blood and transform into vampire to gain eternal life and the ability of self healing. Personality: fanatic, crazy, compassionate (to vampires) Angel She enjoyed watching the battle of Mr. Hunter in the heaven. Her dream is that she can live with Mr. Hunter after his death She take the risk of being pulled out of all the feathers to resurrect Mr. Hunter for five days. Personality: kind, gentle Information of a fifth character: there is a betrayer on the side of the Lord of the Vampire who secretly helps the hero and the heroine to overthrow the rule of him.
